text: Dear university of Rennes 2, I am writing you this mail to expose you my request for a grant linked to a project that is very close to my heart and that i dream of realizing since i was a little girl . When i was a child, I often had to stay in the hospital for weeks and months because of a chronique illness. To soften these many stays my mother brrought me many books and the ones i preffered where the ones that made me travel. one day my mother brought me back a book on Scoland and since that day i only dream of one things : to visit this magical country which allowed me to get out of my bad diseas. This book made me forget the length of these stays and made me fall in love whith this country. Every day i woke up in the hope of one day being able to walk again and visit this magical place. That why i'm asking for your help today and i'm asking you to accompany me in this project by accepting that i do a gap year and by helping me in the financing of this trip. During this gap year my goal will be to collect a maximum of money to help children suffering from the same diseas as me. i created an association called "Paris for my therapy" and i went every day in the hospital of my country with volunteers to distract children with the fairy of the scotland and i want to discover in reality this beautiful country. I have an another project who is to wrote a book and for this i want to inspire me in Paris. I hope you are agree with my project and ok to participate with a grant to support my project. Thanks a lot in advance . Cordially.
